Uses of Interface
com.cyc.kb.Rule

  • Packages that use Rule 
    Package Description
    com.cyc.kb.client
    The implementation of various interfaces specified in com.cyc.kb, refer to that package for a more detailed discussion of using the API.

    • Uses of Rule in com.cyc.kb.client

      Classes in com.cyc.kb.client that implement Rule 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RuleImpl
      A Rule object is a facade for #$CycLRuleAssertion.
      Methods in com.cyc.kb.client that return Rule 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Rule RuleImpl.findOrCreate(Sentence formula)
      Finds or creates the Rule object that corresponds to formula in the default assertion context KBAPIConfiguration.
      static Rule RuleImpl.findOrCreate(Sentence formula, Context ctx)
      Finds or creates the Rule object that corresponds to formula in ctx.
      static Rule RuleImpl.findOrCreate(Sentence formula, Context ctx, KBAPIEnums.Strength s, KBAPIEnums.Direction d)
      Finds or creates the Rule object that corresponds to formula in ctx using the specified strength and direction.
      static Rule RuleImpl.findOrCreate(Sentence antecedent, Sentence consequent, Context ctx)
      Finds or creates the Rule that corresponds to a formula with antecedent and consequent in the context ctx.
      static Rule RuleImpl.findOrCreate(String formulaStr)
      Finds or creates the Rule that corresponds to formulaStr in the default assertion context.
      static Rule RuleImpl.findOrCreate(String formulaStr, String ctxStr)
      Finds or creates the Rule that corresponds to formulaStr in the context ctxStr.
      static Rule RuleImpl.findOrCreate(String formulaStr, String ctxStr, KBAPIEnums.Strength s, KBAPIEnums.Direction d)
      Finds or creates the Rule that corresponds to formulaStr in the context ctxStr with the specified strength and direction.
      static Rule RuleImpl.get(CycObject cycAssert)
      Deprecated. 
      static Rule RuleImpl.get(Sentence formula, Context ctx)
      Get the Rule that corresponds to formula in the context ctx.
      static Rule RuleImpl.get(Sentence antecedent, Sentence consequent, Context ctx)
      Get the Rule that corresponds to a formula with antecedent as its antecedent and consequent as its consequent in the context ctx.
      static Rule RuleImpl.get(String hlid)
      Get the Rule that corresponds to hlid.
      static Rule RuleImpl.get(String formulaStr, String ctxStr)
      Get the Rule for formulaStr in the context ctxStr.
